deviceChanged

public void deviceChanged(GL10 gl,
                          int w,
                          int h,
                          int viewWidth,
                          int viewHeight)
The device information has changed. This function is called by the graphics API. In most cases the Android events let us know or the JOGL API.

Parameters:
gl - Instance of GL10, not valid after the function ends.
w - New width of the device
h - New height of the device
viewWidth -
viewHeight -

onSaveInstance

public void onSaveInstance(Bundle savedInstanceState)

init

public void init(GL10 gl)
Init code path. Since the GL10 instance is only valid at certains times this code path is used to allow states, objects, etc to init anything they require an OpenGL context for.

Parameters:
gl - OpenGL context, local scope.

isInitialized

public boolean isInitialized()
Check if the engine has been initialized.

update

public void update(GL10 gl)
Update code path. Used to process the update step of the game. This would include physics for example.

Parameters:
gl - OpenGL context, local scope.

draw

public void draw(GL10 gl)
Drawing code path. Used to draw all visible on screen objects.

Parameters:
gl - OpenGL context, local scope.
